name: Knight Of Laughter
description:
For several months now, the dwarven king remains silent. No news reach the kingdom of men. Human king dispatches his most loyal knight to reveal the state of the underground kingdom, as well as to make a delivery of utmost importance. Only one path leads to dwarven caves. What shall befall our knight on his way?

Authors
Software engineer: Maga, TimirlanKenji, Sadles
Lvl-designer: TimirlanKenji (timkenji88@gmail.com)
Game designer: Bogdanov Aleksei
Scriptwriter & Narrative designer: Reemus

2D Artist: Jens
UI Designer: LINAAAAAAAAA, Jens
Sound: Соловьев Максим
Project manager: Machaon maackii
